creator: flowkey
descriptionHtml:
With flowkey, you learn to play beautiful piano music from the very beginning. Choose your favorite piano pieces from over 1000 songs and learn all about notes, chords, reading sheet music and the proper technique. Works with your real piano or keyboard, acoustic as well as digital. Ideal for beginners and advanced pianists.

Discover the new way to learn piano:
🎤Play the most popular songs from all genres including classical, pop, rock, and jazz. You can even
choose from the latest game & movie soundtracks
🔝Practice more effectively with direct feedback: flowkey will let you know instantly whether you’re
playing the right notes
🎼Reach your goals: interactive step-by-step courses about notes, chords, rhythm, playing with both
hands, & much more
👁Learn the right technique with high-quality video tutorials recorded by professional pianists
🎹Works with your real piano & keyboard (acoustic as well as digital)

How does it work? 🔍
- Place your smartphone, tablet, or laptop on your instrument
- Choose a song you would like to learn that matches your playing level (beginner,
intermediate, advanced, or pro)
- Take an introductory course for learning the basics, if you are a beginner
- Receive instant feedback on your playing: the app listens to your playing via microphone or MIDI
connection
- Practice individual song sections with the loop function
- Start playing along with the video slowly and then speed it up until you reach the original tempo
- Complete courses and improve your skills step-by-step
- Check your achievements in the learning progress indicator

Your benefits with flowkey 🧡
✔️You don’t need any previous knowledge
✔️You receive new piano songs and exercises regularly
✔️You learn at your own pace and according to your playing level
✔️You have access to unique arrangements by professional pianists
✔️You can test 8 songs & selected tutorials for free
✔️You can start right away: the flowkey app and your piano is all you need


GO PREMIUM TO BECOME A PRO 😎

Please note:

You need a flowkey Premium membership 💎 to gain unrestricted access to all songs and course content. Your subscription options are:

1 month for $19.99
6 months for $83.99
12 months for $119.99
(These are US prices. Pricing in other countries may vary.)

Your membership renews itself automatically unless you cancel no later than 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. If you cancel your subscription, your access to the full library of flowkey content will expire at the end of the subscription period. You can use your Premium account across all your devices.✌🏼

Achieve your goal and learn how to play piano! flowkey is endorsed by some of the most famous YouTube pianists as well as recommended by music teachers and musicians. Join the movement of over 1 million piano players worldwide and improve your skills on your real piano from beginner to pro 🚀Start your piano lessons with flowkey now! 🎓

We look forward to your feedback! Contact us with your questions, comments, or concerns through: feedback@flowkey.com or directly within the app under “Support & Feedback”.

Have fun learning piano! 🎵

Your flowkey team
descriptionShort: Learn to play the piano or keyboard with the songs you love & become a piano pro

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update we fixed minor bugs and we've added more piano pieces to our collection. Two of them are beautiful classics. Discover these pieces and more in the app!

- Molto allegro – Symphony No. 40 in Gm – Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
- Romance – Sonatina in G – Ludwig van Beethoven

Your flowkey team

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Many of our newest pieces were written by American composers and have been played on pianos all over the world for decades. Here’s a small excerpt from this rich mix of songs:

- Carolina Shout – James Price Johnson
- Hesitation Blues – Jelly Roll Morton
- Oh, Lady Be Good! – George Gershwin
- The Sheik of Araby – Ted Snyder

... and many more! Surely there's something for you, too!

Your flowkey team

connection
- Practice individual song sections with the loop function

- Complete courses and improve your skills step-by-step
- Check your achievements in the learning progress indicator

title: flowkey: Learn piano

creator: flowkey
descriptionHtml:
With flowkey, you learn to play beautiful piano music from the very beginning. Choose your favorite piano pieces from over 1500 songs and learn all about notes, chords, reading sheet music and the proper technique. Works with your real piano or keyboard, acoustic as well as digital. Ideal for beginners and advanced pianists.

Discover the new way to learn piano:
🎤Play the most popular songs from all genres including classical, pop, rock, and jazz. You can even
choose from the latest game & movie soundtracks
🔝Practice more effectively with direct feedback: flowkey will let you know instantly whether you’re
playing the right notes
🎼Reach your goals: interactive step-by-step courses about notes, chords, rhythm, playing with both
hands, & much more
👁Learn the right technique with high-quality video tutorials recorded by professional pianists
🎹Works with your real piano & keyboard (acoustic as well as digital)

How does it work? 🔍
- Place your smartphone, tablet, or laptop on your instrument
- Choose a song you would like to learn that matches your playing level (beginner,
intermediate, advanced, or pro)
- Take an introductory course for learning the basics, if you are a beginner
- Receive instant feedback on your playing: the app listens to your playing via microphone or MIDI
connection
- Practice individual song sections with the loop function
- Start playing along with the video slowly and then speed it up until you reach the original tempo
- Complete courses and improve your skills step-by-step
- Check your achievements in the learning progress indicator

Your benefits with flowkey 🧡
✔️You don’t need any previous knowledge
✔️You receive new piano songs and exercises regularly
✔️You learn at your own pace and according to your playing level
✔️You have access to unique arrangements by professional pianists
✔️You can test 8 songs & selected tutorials for free
✔️You can start right away: the flowkey app and your piano is all you need

Choose your favorite piano pieces from over 1500 songs and learn all about notes, chords, reading sheet music and the proper technique. Works with your real piano or keyboard, acoustic as well as digital. Ideal for beginners and advanced pianists.

Discover the new way to learn piano:
🎤Play the most popular songs from all genres including classical, pop, rock, and jazz. You can even
choose from the latest game & movie soundtracks
🔝Practice more effectively with direct feedback: flowkey will let you know instantly whether you’re
playing the right notes
🎼Reach your goals: interactive step-by-step courses about notes, chords, rhythm, playing with both
hands, & much more
👁Learn the right technique with high-quality video tutorials recorded by professional pianists
🎹Works with your real piano & keyboard (acoustic as well as digital)

How does it work? 🔍
- Place your smartphone, tablet, or laptop on your instrument
- Choose a song you would like to learn that matches your playing level (beginner,
intermediate, advanced, or pro)
- Take an introductory course for learning the basics, if you are a beginner
- Receive instant feedback on your playing: the app listens to your playing via microphone or MIDI
connection
- Practice individual song sections with the loop function
- Start playing along with the video slowly and then speed it up until you reach the original tempo
- Complete courses and improve your skills step-by-step
- Check your achievements in the learning progress indicator

Your benefits with flowkey 🧡
✔️You don’t need any previous knowledge
✔️You receive new piano songs and exercises regularly
✔️You learn at your own pace and according to your playing level
✔️You have access to unique arrangements by professional pianists
✔️You can test 8 songs & selected tutorials for free
✔️You can start right away: the flowkey app and your piano is all you need


GO PREMIUM TO BECOME A PRO 😎

Please note:

You need a flowkey Premium membership 💎 to gain unrestricted access to all songs and course content. Your subscription options are:

1 month for £18.99
6 months for £76.99
12 months for £109.99

Your membership renews itself automatically unless you cancel no later than 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. If you cancel your subscription, your access to the full library of flowkey content will expire at the end of the subscription period. You can use your Premium account across all your devices.✌🏼

Achieve your goal and learn how to play piano! flowkey is endorsed by some of the most famous YouTube pianists as well as recommended by music teachers and musicians. Join the movement of over 1 million piano players worldwide and improve your skills on your real piano from beginner to pro 🚀Start your piano lessons with flowkey now! 🎓

We look forward to your feedback! Contact us with your questions, comments, or concerns through: feedback@flowkey.com or directly within the app under “Support & Feedback”.

Have fun learning piano! 🎵

Your flowkey team
descriptionShort: Learn to play the piano or keyboard with the songs you love & become a piano pro

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now is the best time to learn something new! We have improved the learning experience and added inspiring new songs for you. This version also contains bug fixes and improves the app performance.

Your flowkey team

How does it work? 🔍
- Place your smartphone, tablet, or laptop on your instrument

connection

- Start playing along with the video slowly and then speed it up until you reach the original tempo
- Complete courses and improve your skills step-by-step
- Check your achievements in the learning progress indicator

✔️You don’t need any previous knowledge

flowkey makes it fun and easy to play beautiful songs on piano within hours – even if you’re a beginner. Our songs and courses are crafted by professional pianists whose hands will guide you as you play.

Choose your favourite piano pieces from a rich selection of songs across all difficulty levels and genres – Classical, Pop, Film & TV, Video Games, and more.

Learn basics like how to read sheet music, use the proper technique, and play with both hands in our courses. Keep growing with lessons on scales, chords, improvisation, and other topics.

You can use flowkey with acoustic pianos as well as digital pianos and keyboards.

HOW IT WORKS
1 - Place your smartphone, tablet, or laptop on your piano
2 - Choose the song or course you wish to start learning
3 - Get instant feedback as you play – flowkey listens via your device’s microphone or MIDI and lets you know when you’re hitting the right notes

EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO LEARN PIANO

🔁 Loop: Replay a specific section until you perfect it

🎹 Wait Mode: Listens to your playing and waits for you to hit the right notes

🤚 Select a Hand: Practice right and left hands separately

PEOPLE LOVE FLOWKEY
With over 155K 5-star reviews globally, flowkey has been recognised for its superior approach to supporting piano learners and piano teachers worldwide. Here’s what people are saying:

“Before using this app it took me months to learn a new song. With this app you will learn songs in a third of the time – or maybe even less. flowkey is essential for all piano students.”

“flowkey has everything I wanted for learning piano. […] This app is all you need.”

“Great app for beginners. I’ve never played any sort of instrument before, so everything is a bit new and scary. But this app is making me excited to learn.”

TRY IT FOR FREE
Download the app and try our selection of free songs and lessons. All the Premium learning features are available.

EXPAND YOUR LEARNING WITH PREMIUM
Get flowkey Premium to take your piano skills from beginner to pro level. You can customise your subscription in 3 ways:

Billing Cycle 📆
Choose between a monthly or a yearly subscription.

Individual or Family 👥
Get Premium access for 1 person, or share it with up to 4 other people.

Basic or Full Song Access 🎶
• Basic Access – Start with our rich selection of over a thousand classical and royalty-free songs, and upgrade at any time.
• Full Access – Get unlimited access to all songs, from Pop Hits to Film & TV and other exclusive content.

Your subscription will renew automatically unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. If you cancel your subscription, your access to Premium content will expire at the end of the subscription period.

You can access your Premium subscription across all of your devices.

WE’RE HERE TO HELP
Are you ready to join over 10 million piano players worldwide who are learning with flowkey?

If you have any questions or feedback, please get in touch with us! You can reach us by email at support@flowkey.com, or directly in the app, through Support & Feedback.

Terms of Service: https://www.flowkey.com/en/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.flowkey.com/en/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Learn to play the piano or keyboard with the songs you love & become a piano pro

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now is the best time to learn something new! We have improved the learning experience and added inspiring new songs for you. This version also contains bug fixes and improves the app performance.

Your flowkey team

“Before using this app it took me months to learn a new song. With this app you will learn songs in a third of the time – or maybe even less. flowkey is essential for all piano students.”

“flowkey has everything I wanted for learning piano. […] This app is all you need.”

“Great app for beginners. I’ve never played any sort of instrument before, so everything is a bit new and scary. But this app is making me excited to learn.”

TRY IT FOR FREE
Download the app and try our selection of free songs and lessons. All the Premium learning features are available.

EXPAND YOUR LEARNING WITH PREMIUM
Get flowkey Premium to take your piano skills from beginner to pro level. You can customise your subscription in 3 ways:

Billing Cycle 📆
Choose between a monthly or a yearly subscription.

Individual or Family 👥
Get Premium access for 1 person, or share it with up to 4 other people.

Basic or Full Song Access 🎶
• Basic Access – Start with our rich selection of over a thousand classical and royalty-free songs, and upgrade at any time.
• Full Access – Get unlimited access to all songs, from Pop Hits to Film & TV and other exclusive content.

Your subscription will renew automatically unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. If you cancel your subscription, your access to Premium content will expire at the end of the subscription period.

You can access your Premium subscription across all of your devices.

WE’RE HERE TO HELP
Are you ready to join over 10 million piano players worldwide who are learning with flowkey?

If you have any questions or feedback, please get in touch with us! You can reach us by email at support@flowkey.com, or directly in the app, through Support & Feedback.

creator: flowkey

flowkey makes it fun and easy to play beautiful songs on piano within hours – even if you’re a beginner. Our songs and courses are crafted by professional pianists whose hands will guide you as you play.

Choose your favourite piano pieces from a rich selection of songs across all difficulty levels and genres – Classical, Pop, Film & TV, Video Games, and more.

Learn basics like how to read sheet music, use the proper technique, and play with both hands in our courses. Keep growing with lessons on scales, chords, improvisation, and other topics.

descriptionHtml:
flowkey makes it fun and easy to play beautiful songs on piano within hours – even if you’re a beginner. Our songs and courses are crafted by professional pianists whose hands will guide you as you play.

Choose your favourite piano pieces from a rich selection of songs across all difficulty levels and genres – Classical, Pop, Film & TV, Video Games, and more.

Learn basics like how to read sheet music, use the proper technique, and play with both hands in our courses. Keep growing with lessons on scales, chords, improvisation, and other topics.

You can use flowkey with acoustic pianos as well as digital pianos and keyboards.

HOW IT WORKS
1 - Place your smartphone, tablet, or laptop on your piano
2 - Choose the song or course you wish to start learning
3 - Get instant feedback as you play – flowkey listens via your device’s microphone or MIDI and lets you know when you’re hitting the right notes

EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO LEARN PIANO

🔁 Loop: Replay a specific section until you perfect it

🎹 Wait Mode: Listens to your playing and waits for you to hit the right notes

🤚 Select a Hand: Practice right and left hands separately
